com.facebook.rendercore

Interface PoolableContentProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Button, Card, CardClip, CardShadow, Column, Component, EditText, EmptyComponent, HorizontalScroll, HostRenderUnit, Image, LithoRenderUnit, MountableLithoRenderUnit, MountSpecLithoRenderUnit, Progress, Recycler, RecyclerCollectionComponent, RenderUnit, Row, SizeSpecMountWrapperComponent, SolidColor, SpecGeneratedComponent, Spinner, TestComponent, TestComponent, TestDrawableComponent, TestLayoutComponent, TestSizeDependentComponent, TestTransitionComponent, TestViewComponent, Text, TextInput, TouchableFeedback, TransparencyEnabledCard, TransparencyEnabledCardClip, VerticalScroll, ViewCompatComponent, ViewPagerComponent, Wrapper

    public interface PoolableContentProvider
    Defines a class that can provide mountable content to be pooled.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object createPoolableContent(Context context)
      Creates a mount-content that can be pooled.
      MountItemsPool.ItemPool<?> createRecyclingPool()
      Creates an ItemPool for this mountable content.
      java.lang.Object getPoolableContentType()
      Returns an object defining the type of the mount-content.
      boolean isRecyclingDisabled()
      Return true if pooling should be disabled for this mount content.

    • Method Detail

      • createPoolableContent

        java.lang.Object createPoolableContent(Context context)
        Creates a mount-content that can be pooled. This is typically a View or Drawable subclass

      • getPoolableContentType

        java.lang.Object getPoolableContentType()
        Returns an object defining the type of the mount-content. Typically the mount-content's Class.

      • isRecyclingDisabled

        boolean isRecyclingDisabled()
        Return true if pooling should be disabled for this mount content.

      • createRecyclingPool

        MountItemsPool.ItemPool<?> createRecyclingPool()
        Creates an ItemPool for this mountable content. Returning null will generate a default pool.
